channel.title: [Request] Pvp Zone outside bank [PI]
channel.description:
I request a system to handle safe and pvp zone for PI 317. I'm running deathlypvpz v4 Here's how it would work Let's say the bank entrance is two tiles wide. If you walk on any of those two tiles, "Pvp Zone" will activate. Anyone within a level range of 7 levels lower or higher will be able to fight you.
I know there's one flaw with this: If you teleport, Pvp zone will still be active, thus you can now pvp anywhere. This is fixed by adding a line to teleports that activate safe zone directly upon teleportation.
Now, i suck at java and have a pretty shitty attitude towards learning. But i do know the most basic of understanding code algorithms and systems. Would anybody feel like spending their precious time in making this system? If you'd like, i could make you an admin on my server so you can play it with me.

item.title: [Request] Pvp Zone outside bank [PI]
item.dc:creator: @penguinimp penguinimp
item.description:
@penguinimp wrote:

/sigh

    public boolean Outsidebank() {
        if (absX > X && absX < X2 && absY > Y && absY < Y2) {
            if !(absX > bankX && absX < bankX2 && absY > bankY && absY < bankY2) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }

or if you want to make it more understandable, and be able to use it later.

    public boolean PvpZone() {
        if (absX > X && absX < X2 && absY > Y && absY < Y2) {
            if !(inBank()) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
    public boolean inBank() {
        if (absX > X && absX < X2 && absY > Y && absY < Y2) {
            return true;
        }
        //add every bank you want to add
        return false;
    }

Read full topic

item.title: [Request] Pvp Zone outside bank [PI]
item.dc:creator: @morot4 morot4
item.description:
@morot4 wrote:

[quote=“Ashi, post:2, topic:547969”]//single tile
if (playerX == tileX && playerY == tileY) {
…
}

//square (logic might be a little wrong here)
if (player.getX() > topX && player.getY() < topY && player.getX() < bottomX && player.getY() > bottomY) {
…
inRegion
}

//attack
int max = target.combatLevel + 7;
int min = target.combatLevel - 7;

//should be correct logic
if (player.combatLevel > min && player.combatLevel < max) {
…
attack
} else {
sendMessage(“level difference is too much man, can’t attack that player”);
}

You get the idea yeah?[/quote]
I made a square outside of heroes’ guild in Player.java. I saw the safezone square code so i copied it and made a pk square instead


public boolean inHeroesPk() {
		if(absX > 2902 && absX < 2926 && absY > 3494 && absY < 3534) {	
			return true;
		}
		return false;
	}

In client.java, this is my code for walking outside of heroes guild to pk(heroes guild is the home)

} else if(inHeroesPk()) { getPA().walkableInterface(197); getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Pvp Zone", 199); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); wildLevel = 55;

Now the problem is
It says “This is a safe zone!” when you try to attack somebody in the Pk Area. Any idea on how to fix?

If you’d like to help me, i got teamviewer

Id: 552 718 732
Pw: 2098

EDIT: Hahaha some guy went on my teamviewer while i was walking the dog and played gay porn

}

int min = target.combatLevel - 7;

//should be correct logic
if (player.combatLevel > min && player.combatLevel < max) {
…
attack
} else {
sendMessage(“level difference is too much man, can’t attack that player”);
}

You get the idea yeah?
